thread.title: BRIEF-Pointer Telocation Qtrly Revenue Of $78.2 Mln, Up 21 Pct Year-Over-Year‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pointer Telocation Qtrly Revenue Of $78.2 Mln, Up 21 Pct Year-Over-Year‍​
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Pointer Telocation Ltd:
* POINTER TELOCATION LTD QTRLY REVENUES OF $78.2 MILLION, UP 21% YEAR-OVER-YEAR‍​
* POINTER TELOCATION LTD - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.35
* POINTER TELOCATION LTD QTRLY FULLY DILUTED EPS BASED ON NON GAAP BASIS WAS $0.27 PER SHARE
* POINTER TELOCATION LTD QTRLY TOTAL SUBSCRIBERS REACHED 258,000, AN INCREASE OF 16% YEAR-OVER-YEAR‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2otNXhr ) Further company coverage:
